Text: reminderThis is just a quick reminder that we have a conference call for the session you are participating in at ELECTRIC POWER Natural Gas Infrastructure Power Plant Fuel Delivery Issues We will meet briefly with the Chair and the other Speakers to go over items that are due and answer any questions you may have The time for your conference call is Wednesday February PM Central Standard Time TollFree Number Conference Code enter the star before and after the numbers Attached to this email is a Power Point template This template is a guideline to be used if you prepare a Power Point presentation You may change the font and color of the text please no company logos or advertising Final presentations are due March Email final presentations to mailto If you have any questions please give me a call at x Thank you Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager Phone x Fax Email mailto

ReminderThis is just a quick reminder that we have a conference call for the session you are participating in at ELECTRIC POWER Natural Gas Infrastructure Fuel Energy Management and Maintaining Infrastructure Viability We will meet briefly with the Chair and the other Speakers to go over items that are due and answer any questions you may have The time for your conference call is Thursday February AM Central Standard Time TollFree Number Conference Code enter the star before and after the numbers If you cannot make the conference call during the scheduled time please make arrangements to have a colleague conference in on your behalf Attached to this email is a Power Point template This template is a guideline to be used if you prepare a Power Point presentation You may change the font and color of the text please no company logos or advertising You can have your company logo on the first slide only Final presentations are due March Email final presentations to mailto If you have any questions please give me a call at x Thank you Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager Phone x Fax Email mailto

Natural Gas Infrastructure Cc October Ms Lisa Norwood Manager Fuels Acquisition Calpine Dear Ms Norwood Following my recent conversation with Mr Kevin Hyatt Enron Transportation Services I would like to confirm our invitation for you to participate as a panelist in the NATURAL GAS INFRASTRUCTURE Conference colocated with ELECTRIC POWER for the session titled Power Plant Fuel Delivery Issues This session will take place on Wednesday March pm pm at the Americas Center in St Louis MO We have you scheduled to present on the subject of Transportation Scheduling Firm vs Interruptible vs other Transportation We plan to hold a conference call in January or February with the Chair and the other presenters participating You will be notified with the date and time for the conference call For now plan to present for about minutes on the subject Time should be allotted at the end for a question answer session By November please submit a one or two paragraph abstract on the subject Around January we will need your final paperpresentation for publishing on the CD Rom proceedings that will be distributed to every delegate attending the conference In addition your presentation will be available on the ELECTRIC POWER website at wwwelectricpowerexpocom Enclosed are the preliminary conference brochures for the NATURAL GAS INFRASTRUCTURE and ELECTRIC POWER Conference Also in your package is a list of confirmed and prospective panelists for the session you have agreed to participate in The NATURAL GAS INFRASTRUCTURE and ELECTRIC POWER Conference Exhibition is sponsored by POWER Magazine and is committed to providing a valuable and meaningful forum for operating companies in the changing power generation industry Whether their roots are in a traditional electric utility or an independent power producer these companies face the challenge of generating clean reliable power in a competitive market An industrybased Advisory Committee has programmed the Conference with input from the ELECTRIC POWER GenCo Alliance Members that ownoperate more than megawatts of generating capacity Thank you for agreeing to participate A formal confirmation package will be sent by midNovember or December with complete details on the conference call hotel travel information and other items to prepare you for the conference Take care Best regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager ELECTRIC POWER Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager ELECTRIC POWER Conference Exhibition The TradeFair Group Blalock Suite Houston TX x fax mailto

Natural Gas Infrastructure Followup from Meeting Cc The Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee met recently in Houston to finalize the programming of the conference Attached to this email is the new program with revisions implemented from the September th meeting We have put together a timeline of initiatives that must be made in order for the Natural Gas Infrastructure Conference to take off in time for publishing the program Please follow this general timeline and inform Conference Management if you are unable to meet the due dates for these tasks Important we are looking to the committee for volunteers to participate in the sessions outlined in the Natural Gas Infrastructure Track Kevin Hyatt Director Asset Development Enron Transportation Services is coordinating these opportunities for session Chairs and Speakers If you are interested in participating in one of the sessions please contact me before October th Task Due Week Of Make initial phone calls to prospects October Send Conference Management your prospects name contact October information and the status of your conversation so that we can issue a formal invitation Make calls to followup with prospect and reference the invitations that October were issued by Conference Management Inform Conference Management with any confirmations you receive October Complete Conference Programming and Abstracts Due November After November st changes will be handled by the Session Chairs not the entire committee Confirmation Letters and Speaker Kit mailed by Conference Team Nov Dec Speaker kits include a conference call information b details for submitting papers c hotel travel information d complementary registration e other important items Speaker Bios and Formal Papers due FYI January Conference Calls with each Session Chair Speakers participating Jan Feb Conference Management will notify you with details related to the conference call Thank you for your participation on the Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee We will be meeting with the ELECTRIC POWER Committee on October th in St Louis Please RSVP to me if you plan on attending the St Louis Meeting next Tuesday Thanks Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager ELECTRIC POWER Conference Exhibition The TradeFair Group Blalock Suite Houston TX x fax

RE NGI committee speakerFYI I talked with David Johnson regarding that article from the New England Power Plant Journal He said he could not find it and he thinks he already threw it away I will let you know if he locates any other interesting articles and this time I wont let him throw it away Also I spoke with David Sweet Independent Petroleum Association of America He is interested in chairing that session but is awaiting budget concerns Ill forward the email to you that he sent me We are going to call him at am tomorrow Do you want to be included on the call Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Friday October PM To Carrie Shapiro Email Subject NGI committee speaker Importance High Carrie Mike Nelson Vice Pres of Pipeline Integrity for Enron has agreed to speak at NGI Session A on Pipeline Infrastructure Security Mike can be contacted via the following Mr Michel Nelson Enron Transportation Services PO Box Suite AC Houston TX Please send him a conf invite at your earliest convenience thanks kh This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

FW Natural Gas Ifrastructure Paper AbstractKevin Here is an abstract I received for the Natural Gas Infrastructure track Please let me know if you would like to include it in one of the sessions Also let me know if the abstract does not fit but if he is a good candidate perhaps he could moderate a session or modify his abstract so that it will fit in the program Thanks Kevin Original Message From Fred Owens mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Carrie Shapiro Subject Natural Gas Ifrastructure Paper Abstract Carrie Attached please find an abstract for the natural gas group Please email or call me at if you have any questions or comments Sincerely Fred Owens

FW Starline Presentation ProposalKevin this presentation has been revised we explained to her that the other one was too much about what they are doing and their exclusive license and that it needs to be more practical and topical to apply to the audience that will be in attendance They have a client as well that could participate Please review the information and let me know what you think Thanks Kevin Original Message From Mike Niles Sent Tuesday November PM To Carrie Shapiro Subject FW Starline Presentation Proposal Importance High Carrie Here you go Let me know if this will work for NGI Thanks Mike Original Message From Spurway Catherine mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Subject Starline Presentation Proposal Importance High Good afternoon Mike As discussed below please find a revised idea of the presentation we would like to give at the Gas Infrastructure show We would like to do a dual presentation where Ted Fiala our director of new technology presents the starline process and then is followed by a presentation by Mike Beezak of Philadelphia Gas Works who has used the starline process many times Mikes presentation would be a highlevel case study of how PGW arrived at the idea of using the technology and how it worked out We are currently working out the details with Mike and will be able to provide you with the presentation prior to the show in march to ensure it is suitable We are extremely interested in introducing this new technology to the gas leaders that will be present at the Gas Infrastructure Conference and sharing our utility experience Thank you Catherine Spurway Marketing Services Coordinator Exelon Infrastructure Services Yale Avenue Morton PA Ph Fax Gas Infrastructure ppt

Update Natural Gas Infrastructure ConferenceDear Kevin Attached to this email is a current program of speakerschairs that have agreed or have been invited to participate in the NATURAL GAS INFRASTRUCTURE Conference colocated with ELECTRIC POWER The invitationconfirmation letters have been issued on a casebycase basis as Conference Management has received the information from you We will be sending out a formal confirmation kit to all those participating in the Natural Gas Infrastructure Conference The kit will be mailed during the first week of December that will include conference call information hotel travel details instructions for submitting final papers complementary registration information etc Presenters are asked to turn in an abstract for publishing on the web at wwwelectricpowerexpocom Abstracts are due November Presenters should email a one to three paragraph abstract to mailto Final papers will be due January If you have not already done so please send a description of your session for the conference brochure A brief two three sentence description will be sufficient Please email the session descriptions by Tuesday November Email mailto PS The conference brochure is scheduled to print on November If you have any new information that needs to be updated regarding your session please notify me now and I will make sure it gets printed correctly in the conference brochure Please review the attached program for the NATURAL GAS INFRASTRUCTURE Conference as indicated in the above paragraph We have enjoyed working with you on the NATURAL GAS INFRASTRUCTURE Conference and appreciate all of your hard work and time dedicated to making this conference a success We will keep in touch with you over the coming months and look forward to seeing you at the conference next March Take care Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager ELECTRIC POWER Conference Exhibition The TradeFair Group Blalock Suite Houston TX x fax mailto

Electric Power Conference Cc Hello Electric Power Committee Members You should be receiving a package in the mail within a couple of days that will have information related to the August th Committee Meeting for the Electric Power Conference The contents of this package will contain Minutes from the August th meeting Worksheets for each tracktactical meeting Copies of any new abstracts for your conference track Abstracts that were reviewed at the last meeting if you were unable to attend Conference Outline Committee Member list Conference brochure Attached to this email is a summary of the abstracts received to date This is a quick reference for you to compare the abstracts you get in the mail If there is abstract listed on this sheet that is not located in your package please contact Carrie Shapiro Casey Meek or Nicole Dickson at and we will fax or email the abstracts you need Thanks for your participation on the committee We will see you at the final meeting on Tuesday October am pm at the St Louis Renaissance Hotel Natural Bridge Road near Lambert Airport Notethis is a different hotel than the previous meetings If you do not receive a package in the mail by Monday August please contact Carrie Shapiro at x Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager Electric Power Conference Exhibition The TradeFair Group Blalock Suite Houston TX x fax mailto

Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee MeetingAugust Hello Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee Members I wanted to take a quick poll and see how your calendars are looking for the third week of September Since there are several committee members that are located in Houston TX we would like to schedule a meeting in Houston the third week of September for the Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee This meeting will probably be a lunch meeting from am pm at a hotel in the Galleria area Please reply back indicating your preference for one of these meeting dates Tuesday September Wednesday September Thursday September If you have any suggestions or know anyone that may be interested in participating on the Natural Gas Infrastructure committee please email or call me at x Ill be happy to send an invitation on your behalf For your review please see the minutes and worksheets for NGI attached to this email Thanks for your participation on the committee We will be getting back with you soon as to the exact date time and location of the next meeting scheduled for September in Houston Have a nice day Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager Electric Power Conference Exhibition The TradeFair Group Blalock Suite Houston TX x fax mailto

FW Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee Meeting in HoustonHere you go Have a great Labor Day Weekend Original Message From Carrie Shapiro Sent Friday August AM To Cc Sean Guerre David Johnson Greg Lesniewicz Heather Haygood Subject Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee Meeting in Houston August Memo to the Natural Gas Infrastructure SubCommittee As requested by the committee members the next meeting for the Natural Gas Infrastructure subcommittee will be held on September in Houston TX We have arranged a meeting at the DoubleTree Hotel Post Oak Post Oak Boulevard in the Galleria Area am pm Lunch will be provided and the meeting will take place in the Galleria C meeting room This will be a meeting for you to finalize the program for the Natural Gas Infrastructure Track for next March and identify any problem areas needing special attention We hope to go on press with the program in late October The worksheets that were completed at the last meeting for the Natural Gas Infrastructure track and an updated conference outline are attached to this email Please let me know if you need additional information or have questions Please RSVP by September Email mailto or call me at x Thank you for your participation on the Natural Gas Infrastructure Program Committee We appreciate your support If you would like to nominate a representative to join the Natural Gas Infrastructure subcommittee please contact Carrie Shapiro at x Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager Electric Power Conference Exhibition The TradeFair Group Blalock Suite Houston TX x fax mailto

Chair Kit ELECTRIC POWER Cc Dear ELECTRIC POWER Chair We are looking forward to seeing you next week at the ELECTRIC POWER Conference The long awaited event is finally here and we are excited and ready Registrations are going well and we expect good attendance Just a reminder please make sure you stop by the Conference Information Desk to pick up your Chair Kit The package will contain bios announcements and an evaluation form for your session Please make arrangements to pick these materials up as soon as you arrive The Conference Information Desk is located on the st level across from registration Dont forget the Speakers Breakfast which will be held the morning of your session from am am on the nd level of the Conference Center Atrium Once again thank you for your support of ELECTRIC POWER We will see you next week Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager Get Ready ELECTRIC POWER will be held in HOUSTON TEXAS MARCH at the George R Brown Convention Center wwwelectricpowerexpocom Phone x Fax Email mailto

RE NGI CommitteeHere you go Let me know if any of them come back rejected We will work on redoing our reports so that it does not do that anymore Here is the manually revised version for email addresses Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Wednesday October PM To Carrie Shapiro Subject RE NGI Committee Carrie thanks for the list On the Accepted page some of the emails were truncated Can you get someone to fix this and resend me the page thanks Original Message From Carrie Shapiro mailto radefairgroupcom Sent Wednesday October AM To Hyatt Kevin Subject RE NGI Committee Kevin here is a list of folkes I invited for NGI They are either invited accepted or declined That was as of I attached the latest accepted only committee list as well Let me know if you need additional info Thanks Kevin Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Wednesday October AM To Subject NGI Committee You gave me a copy of a page with all the names addresses phones etc of folks interested in the NGI committee It looks like it was set up on an excel spreadsheet Can you please email me the spreadsheet thanks kh This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE Electric Pwr Conf Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee Cc Kevin Im meeting with David Sweet Vice President Natural Gas IPAA today to discuss their involvement and support with NGI as well Ill get back with you later on and let you know how it went Thanks Kevin Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Monday October PM To Hyatt Kevin Cc Subject Electric Pwr Conf Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee Importance High Hi everyone For those of you I havent met personnally my name is Kevin Hyatt I am currently chairing the Natural Gas Infrastructure subcommittee for the Electric Power Conference to be held in March You are receiving this email because you have previously expressed an interest in serving on the committee Attached below is the current subcommittee track agenda with the sessions and each sessions speaking topics The track and topics were developed over the last months with various inputs from committee members and the Trade Fair Group staff Our current challenge is finding speakers for items and highlighted in red If you move your cursor over the topic the comment box will appear outlining in a little better detail what info we are trying to present for the conference attendees I am working on lining up several speakers but as of yet have only confirmed one from Calpine What I need each of you to do is review the agenda think about who you may know who would be a good speaker for the topic then call them to see if they are interested Speeches should last no more than minutes with a QA period afterward If possible please email or call me with your results by Friday Interested speakers will receive a formal invitation from the Trade Fair Group confirming their attendance Thanks for your help Dont hesitate to call me or Carrie Shapiro x with any questions EP NGIxls This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE GE Presenter for NGI subcommittee Cc Hi Kevin This is great Yes I will followup with Dave regarding the article I do recall the discussion He is out of the office today but I will check with him on Monday Thanks Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Friday October AM To Carrie Shapiro Email Subject GE Presenter for NGI subcommittee Importance High Carrie Mr Colin Wilkes from General Electric Power Systems has agreed to present for NGI Session C on He will cover two topics including Changing gas quality specs and their impact to turbines and Pressure Reliability He is preparing his initial draft which should be available in the next two weeks Please forward to him a conference invitation at your earliest convenience Contact info is as follows Mr Colin Wilkes General Electric Building Room River Road Schenectady NY Also when you me and Dave met at the PO DoubleTree Dave mentioned an article he saw dealing with LNG gas specs and their impact to gen units He was going to try and get me a copy of the article and check into whether or not the author would want to present at the conference at least thats my recollection Can you follow up with Dave to see if hes had any success thanks kh This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE Abstract for the Electric Power ConferenceHi Kevin this is great Is this for the session on Power Plant Fuel Delivery Issues and if so I guess he is confirmed correct Let me know Thanks Kevin Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Thursday November AM To Carrie Shapiro Email Subject FW Abstract for the Electric Power Conference Carrie FYI Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday November AM To Hyatt Kevin Subject Abstract for the Electric Power Conference Kevin Attached is an abstract of a paper submitted for your consideration for presentation at the March Electric Power Conference in St Louis Also included is a brief biography I have also been asked to submit the paper to the Southern Gas Association Management Meeting in April following the Electric Power conference Do you know if there any issues with copyright of the published paper as long as the Electric Power Conference is properly referenced ABSTRACTdoc Biographydoc Regards Colin Wilkes Principal Engineer CASE Control Systems Integration Engineering Bldg General Electric Company One River Road Schenectady NY Tel Dial Comm fax Dial Comm This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

FW NaturalGas Information RequestKevin this lady listed below in the marketingpr dept of Exelon Infrastructure Services requested information for their company to speak at the Natural Gas Infrastructure Conference Do you have something in mind where this organization might make a good fit in one of the NGI sessions Original Message From Shannon Jones Sent Thursday October AM To Greg Lesniewicz Christy West Carrie Shapiro Subject FW NaturalGas Information Request Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday October AM To Shannon Jones Subject NaturalGas Information Request Company Exelon Infrastructure Services First Catherine Middle Last Spurway Title Mktg Address Yale Ave Address City Morton State PA Zip Phone Fax Email Please Send me Information on Attending Exhibiting Travel Speaking Please also Send me Information on Electric Power Attending Exhibiting

Natural Gas Infrastructure Final PresentationDear ELECTRIC POWER Presenter A couple of weeks ago you should have received your speaker confirmation package in the mail that contained important information regarding your participation in the ELECTRIC POWER Conference March in St Louis MO at the Americas Convention Center The due date for turning in your final presentation is January but we would appreciate it if you could send it in as soon as possible We will be including presentations in the CD Rom proceedings that will be distributed to delegates attending the conference and we have a tight deadline to meet Please email your presentation to mailto or load your presentation on a diskette and mail to Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager ELECTRIC POWER Conference Blalock Suite Houston TX If you are preparing a power point slide show for your presentation you must use the template attached to this email as your master slide No company logos or advertising will be accepted An instruction sheet for preparing presentations was included in the speaker confirmation package but is also attached to this email for quick reference Other Important Information Please make note of the conference call that is scheduled for your sessions The date time and phone number for the conference call is listed on the cover sheet that was included in the speaker confirmation package we recently mailed to you If you did not receive a speaker confirmation package in the mail or need another one please call Casey Meek Conference Coordinator at x Should you have any questions regarding the format of the presentation or any other questions regarding your participation please call Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager at x Happy Holidays and Happy New Year Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager The TradeFair Group Blalock Suite Houston TX x fax mailto wwwelectricpowerexpocom wwwpetrobizitcom

Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee Meeting in Houston Cc August Memo to the Natural Gas Infrastructure SubCommittee As requested by the committee members the next meeting for the Natural Gas Infrastructure subcommittee will be held on September in Houston TX We have arranged a meeting at the DoubleTree Hotel Post Oak Post Oak Boulevard in the Galleria Area am pm Lunch will be provided and the meeting will take place in the Galleria C meeting room This will be a meeting for you to finalize the program for the Natural Gas Infrastructure Track for next March and identify any problem areas needing special attention We hope to go on press with the program in late October The worksheets that were completed at the last meeting for the Natural Gas Infrastructure track and an updated conference outline are attached to this email Please let me know if you need additional information or have questions Please RSVP by September Email mailto or call me at x Thank you for your participation on the Natural Gas Infrastructure Program Committee We appreciate your support If you would like to nominate a representative to join the Natural Gas Infrastructure subcommittee please contact Carrie Shapiro at x Best Regards Carrie Shapiro Conference Manager Electric Power Conference Exhibition The TradeFair Group Blalock Suite Houston TX x fax mailto
